rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {09-4, 10, 21, 41, 50}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MGF2100, MGG1100, MGW1100}
Unit was previously coded {DEB1230, MGF1100%, MGF2100, MGM1230, MGW1100%, MGW2100, MGX1100%, MGX1230%}

description: Communication theory emphasising written and oral communication in relation to organisational, intrapersonal, interpersonal and group communication. Importance of relationships in the work context, language, listening and nonverbal behaviour. Interpersonal contexts include negotiation, interviewing, feedback, coaching and counselling. Group communication -- roles, leadership and facilitation, problem-solving, decision making and group creativity.
